ctx: Države članice EU za zamrznitev 6,3 milijarde evrov evropskih sredstev Madžarski
content:
ok, ta novica je zelo na pol droga...

manjka tole za kontekst:

Czech Ambassador to the EU Edita Hrdá told Playbook that
ambassadors agreed to freeze 55 percent of three EU cohesion
programs for Hungary, instead of 65 percent proposed by von der
Leyen. The slightly lower fine comes as part of a package deal
under which Hungary will lift its veto on aid to Ukraine and on the
minimum corporate tax.


www.politico.eu/news...ns-latest/
author: crt
